title: Frontend
leftSectionContent: Skilled in building responsive, accessible, and interactive user experiences using React.js, Next.js, and Tailwind CSS. I specialize in crafting pixel-perfect UIs, implementing smooth animations with GSAP and Framer Motion, and optimizing performance for both mobile and desktop platforms. With a strong focus on usability, scalability, and design systems, I ensure seamless integration between frontend logic and visual design across all screen sizes.
rightSectionContent: Bring interfaces to life with Framer Motion, GSAP, and Three.js for immersive, animated experiences. Proficient in converting Figma designs into clean, production-ready code.

title: Backend
leftSectionContent: Experienced in designing and developing scalable server-side applications using Python, Java, Ruby on Rails, and Flask. Skilled in crafting robust RESTful APIs and microservices that are secure, efficient, and easy to maintain. I focus on writing clean, modular code, implementing background job processing, and integrating databases like PostgreSQL and MongoDB to support high-performance, data-driven systems.
rightSectionContent: Deploy applications efficiently on AWS and Vercel with Docker and Kubernetes. Manage state and caching with Redis, and optimize API performance for real-world demands.

title: Full-Stack
leftSectionContent: Proficient in integrating React.js frontends with robust Node.js and Express backends, ensuring seamless client-server communication and reliable end-to-end functionality. I build RESTful and real-time APIs, manage authentication and authorization flows, and handle state synchronization between frontend and backend. With a strong understanding of full stack workflows, I prioritize performance, scalability, and maintainable architecture in all integrations.
rightSectionContent: Manage and scale relational and NoSQL databases like PostgreSQL and MongoDB. Build reliable, efficient full-stack applications with real-world scalability in mind.
